reviews.subject: Physics 101
reviews.review: Dr. Carter is very knowledgeable and her lectures are clear. However, the exams are tough and require thorough understanding.

reviews.subject: History 201
reviews.review: An excellent professor! Dr. Smith makes history come alive with his storytelling. Highly recommended.

reviews.subject: Chemistry 105
reviews.review: Her lectures are informative but can be a bit dry. Labs are well-organized but expect a lot of work.

reviews.subject: Calculus 101
reviews.review: The lectures are hard to follow, and the professor doesn't explain concepts well. I had to rely heavily on the textbook.

reviews.subject: Biology 150
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is passionate about biology and makes every class interesting. Her exams are fair and straightforward.

reviews.subject: English Literature 202
reviews.review: A good professor with a deep understanding of literature. Sometimes, the assignments can be a bit overwhelming.

reviews.subject: Sociology 101
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is an amazing lecturer who encourages critical thinking. The class discussions are always engaging.

reviews.subject: Psychology 101
reviews.review: The course content is interesting, but Dr. Anderson can be a bit disorganized at times. Still, he is approachable and helpful.

reviews.subject: Economics 102
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is great at explaining complex economic theories in simple terms. His exams are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Art History 200
reviews.review: An incredible professor! Dr. Taylor's passion for art is contagious. Her lectures are a treat to attend.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: The material is interesting, but Dr. Thomas's lectures are monotone and hard to follow. I struggled to stay engaged.

reviews.subject: Political Science 205
reviews.review: Dr. White knows her stuff and is very organized. The coursework is heavy, but she is fair and offers plenty of help.

reviews.subject: Statistics 101
reviews.review: The professor is knowledgeable, but the course is very math-heavy. Make sure you have a good foundation in math.

reviews.subject: Anthropology 150
reviews.review: A fascinating course! Dr. Clark's enthusiasm for anthropology makes every class enjoyable. Highly recommend.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science 101
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is passionate about the environment and brings in real-world examples to make the content relatable. The workload is manageable.

reviews.subject: Music Theory 200
reviews.review: Dr. Young is an expert in her field. Her classes are challenging but rewarding. She's also very supportive of her students.

reviews.subject: Computer Science 101
reviews.review: The course is difficult, and Dr. King moves quickly through the material. Make sure to keep up with the assignments.

reviews.subject: Ethics 101
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is a great lecturer who encourages deep thinking. The class discussions are always interesting.

reviews.subject: Business 200
reviews.review: Dr. Scott's business course is practical and insightful. His real-world experience adds a lot of value to the lectures.

reviews.subject: Astronomy 101
reviews.review: A fascinating course! Dr. Green is very knowledgeable, and her passion for astronomy is evident. However, the exams are tough.
